docs.snippet: Uruguay will be without striker Edinson Cavani when they take a 21-man squad to Austria for a World Cup warmup in Klagenfurt next Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay will be without striker Edinson Cavani when they take a 21-man squad to Austria for a World Cup warmup in Klagenfurt next Wednesday.

headline.main: Uruguay Drop Injured Cavani for Austria World Cup Warmup
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Drop Injured Cavani for Austria World Cup Warmup

docs.snippet: In the 1960s, Sebastião Salgado’s left-leaning politics led him to flee from Brazil to France, where he explored the lives of the working poor through photography.
docs.abstract: In the 1960s, Sebastião Salgado’s left-leaning politics led him to flee from Brazil to France, where he explored the lives of the working poor through photography.

headline.main: Sebastião Salgado: Migrant in a World of Migrants

docs.snippet: Centre-back Eric Abidal and midfielder Samir Nasri were missing when France coach Didier Deschamps named a 24-man squad on Thursday for next week's friendly against the Netherlands.
docs.lead_paragraph: Centre-back Eric Abidal and midfielder Samir Nasri were missing when France coach Didier Deschamps named a 24-man squad on Thursday for next week's friendly against the Netherlands.

headline.main: Nasri, Abidal Out of France Squad, Griezmann Called Up

docs.snippet: Jermain Defoe retained his place on England's roster for Wednesday's exhibition against Denmark despite his upcoming move to Canada.

headline.main: Defoe Retained by England; Shaw Gets 1st Call-Up

docs.snippet: Paris St Germain striker Edinson Cavani has recovered from a thigh problem and will return to the squad for Sunday's Ligue 1 home game with fifth-placed Olympique Marseille.
docs.lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain striker Edinson Cavani has recovered from a thigh problem and will return to the squad for Sunday's Ligue 1 home game with fifth-placed Olympique Marseille.

headline.main: PSG Striker Cavani Back for Marseille Clash
headline.print_headline: PSG Striker Cavani Back for Marseille Clash

docs.snippet: Edinson Cavani enjoyed a memorable comeback after spending four weeks on the sidelines with a thigh injury as he scored in Paris St Germain's 2-0 win over Olympique Marseille on Sunday to help his side move eight points clear at the top of Ligue 1.
docs.lead_paragraph: Edinson Cavani enjoyed a memorable comeback after spending four weeks on the sidelines with a thigh injury as he scored in Paris St Germain's 2-0 win over Olympique Marseille on Sunday to help his side move eight points clear at the top of Ligue 1.

headline.main: Cavani Scores on Comeback as PSG Move Eight Points Clear
headline.print_headline: Cavani Scores on Comeback as PSG Move Eight Points Clear

docs.snippet: Gustavo Poyet has plotted a Sunderland revival by opting for a consensus rather than a dictatorial approach to management, according to his number two Mauricio Taricco.
docs.lead_paragraph: Gustavo Poyet has plotted a Sunderland revival by opting for a consensus rather than a dictatorial approach to management, according to his number two Mauricio Taricco.

headline.main: Poyet Is a Consensus Boss-Sunderland No 2 Taricco
headline.print_headline: Poyet Is a Consensus Boss-Sunderland No 2 Taricco

docs.snippet: Brazilian-born Diego Costa could finally make his Spain debut on Wednesday when the world and European champions host Italy in one of more than 60 friendly internationals being played worldwide.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian-born Diego Costa could finally make his Spain debut on Wednesday when the world and European champions host Italy in one of more than 60 friendly internationals being played worldwide.

headline.main: Last Chance for World Cup Hopefuls, History for Kosovo
headline.print_headline: Last Chance for World Cup Hopefuls, History for Kosovo

docs.snippet: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli acknowledges that playing Spain in a friendly three months before the World Cup may not be the best idea but a decent performance could help his side take a step forward in their development.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli acknowledges that playing Spain in a friendly three months before the World Cup may not be the best idea but a decent performance could help his side take a step forward in their development.

headline.main: Playing Spain Before World Cup Is Risky-Italy's Prandelli
headline.print_headline: Playing Spain Before World Cup Is Risky-Italy's Prandelli

docs.snippet: Sports psychologist Steve Peters has been called on to give England renewed hope at the soccer World Cup having worked wonders for Britain's cyclists at the Olympics and helped Liverpool's Premier League title challenge.
docs.lead_paragraph: Sports psychologist Steve Peters has been called on to give England renewed hope at the soccer World Cup having worked wonders for Britain's cyclists at the Olympics and helped Liverpool's Premier League title challenge.

headline.main: England Employ Psychologist in Bid to Shine in Brazil
